content.question: Which of the following best explains the point of view toward Peter the Great that Voltaire expresses in the passage?

choices.label: Voltaire admired rulers who governed through principles of enlightened absolutism.
Voltaire’s Deist philosophy made him an admirer of Peter the Great’s religious policies in Russia.
Voltaire admired Peter the Great’s development of Russia’s economy along mercantilist principles.

content.answer: Voltaire admired rulers who governed through principles of enlightened absolutism.

topic.text: 4.6: Enlightened and Other Approaches to Power

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
